author: ben.mesnik
title: Build NFT liquidity pools
description: As NFTs são muito ilíquidas e não há uma fonte confiável de preço, mas estas são necessárias para expandir as NFTs para a DeFi.

f6_assessments.q0: This appears to be a worthwhile project that has identified a suitable problem. The project certainly seems to have the potential to add value to the Cardano community and has provided a clear rationale for the need. I would have benefitted from further examples of how the the pools would work to allow me to fully understand the critical importance of the proposal.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposers are Plutus pioneers which suggests they have (or are developing) excellent skills in writing the required code. The plan is in the preliminary stage and could have been more fleshed out to give greater strength. While a short page on Funigyfi was good to note it still left me with many questions. I sense that this project will grow with time.
f6_assessments.q2: I feel this is a project with a lot of potential but could not fully verify this fact with the information provided at this stage. I have high expectations that the team is busy collaborating and coding and will progress the project regardless of success in this funding round. Overall a solid proposal that seems to require further work to realise it potential. I would have liked to see further information on the proposers and previous work, and perhaps a whitepaper would be appropriate for this project.

f6_assessments.q0:
I believe NFT lending will be foundational to defi within a very short period of time based on my extensive defi experience with yield farming, collaterization and recently getting into NFTs.

It's obvious at this point that NFTs aren't just JPEGs and have staying power and tons of value because some of them are highly sought after. Only downside to this is all that liquidity is locked away in the NFT itself. This proposal aims to mend that gap and help NFTs specifically blue chips with higher volume become liquid. This proposal is perfect for this challenge category.
f6_assessments.q1: Based on the teams experience, I believe they have a high likeihood of success. I appreciate that the team themselves identified some of the questions and areas of risk. This demonstrates a level of not only competence but willingness to ask the tough questions instead of getting blindsided by them later, and gives me more confidence that the team can execute this proposal with a high degree of success.
f6_assessments.q2:
The roadmap itself from a developers perspective looks fantastic as I believe they are including all the necessary components for a successful implementation of the product described.

The team states that they intend to go through a code audit themselves, which again, speaks to their competence and willingness to be accountable. The milestones set forth along with the KPIs listed I believe make sense and if reached, should result in a successful proposal therefore the proposer does indeed present a highly auditable proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal addresses the main objectives of the challenge, by proposing to create a market for instant NFT liquidity and price discovery. I agree with the problem statement about NFT being unreliable source of price due to its limited liquidity which in turn preventing the expansion of NFT usage in DeFi. In my opinion the team's idea has potential to solve the issue. The proposed Plutus-native NFT-FT pooling protocol, enable people to Have access to immediate liquidity for your NFTs, earn yield on NFTs, Use NFTs as collateral for loans, invest in indexes of NFT projects, Swap NFTs of the same type effortlessly and, Become fractional holders of NFT projects. This can be a gamechanger that drive massive adoption of NFT in DeFi.
f6_assessments.q1: As two first cohort Plutus Pioneers and Haskell developers with degrees in Computer Science, team members have relevant experience and significant credential that could boost the likelihood of project success. They also provide details about how to execute the project by providing milestones and detailed roadmap for three, six, and twelve months and breakdown of budget. They also address the Risk of their project although no mitigation provided. My suggestion is for the team to add mitigation plan or potential solution to the open question or risk of the project to ensure the success of project execution.
f6_assessments.q2: The project will have official code audit to ensure its security. The community can monitor the progress through the number of protocols building on top of and the number of projects releasing with its NFT-FT pool infrastructure. The team set up a reasonable success target of more than 3 protocols building on top of it and 20+ projects released with its NFT-FT pool infrastructure. To improve, I would like to suggest the team to provide monthly report on the progress as well as budget spending in their website or cardano forum so it can be more accessible and transparent.

solution: Os pools NFT-FT criam um mercado para a descoberta instantânea de liquidez e preços NFT. Eles são uma necessidade primitiva para que as NFTs sejam utilizadas na DeFi.
experience: Somos dois primeiros colaboradores da Plutus Pioneers e da Haskell com formação em Ciência da Computação.
